page.title: 05FARM MACHINERY AND ITS USES
page.content: BALER -- makes bales for corn stalks. BUCK RAKE -- a tipping machine used on the back of a tractor. COMBINED HARVESTER -- cuts corn and separates seed. CHAIN HARROW -- removes large stones. LAND ROVER -- vehicle able to travel over rough ground. MUCK SPREADER -- spreads slurry. POST BUMPER -- machine for banging in fence posts. SILAGER -- collects up grass and puts it in trailer. SPRAYER -- sprays out chemical weedkiller, etc. TILLAGER -- spreads tillage over fields. TRUCK -- vehicle used for carting and milk collecting from farm.
